com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Interface ParseEvaluationObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParseEvaluationFScoreCalculator, ParseEvaluationGuessTemplateWriter, ParseEvaluationObserverImpl, ParseEvaluationSentenceWriter, ParserFScoreCalculatorByDistance, ParseTimeByLengthObserver

    public interface ParseEvaluationObserver
    An interface that observes a parsing evaluation while its occurring.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
